description: This lightweight jacket is designed with a bi-swing construction that allows for enhanced mobility. The crisp-weather essential also has a peached microfiber shell that's incredibly soft.
fitting_details: Size medium has a 28" front body length, a 27½" back body length, a 20" shoulder, a 50" chest, and a 35½" sleeve length. Sleeve length is taken from the center back of the neck and changes ¾" between sizes.
Point collar. Full-zip front. Extended buttoned throat tab.
Long sleeves with adjustable buttoned tabs at the cuffs.
Two front waist angled pockets. Interior left chest pocket.
Elasticized hem at the sides and back. Fully lined.
Signature embroidered pony at the left chest.
Shell and sleeve lining: 100% polyester. Body lining: 100% cotton.
Model is 6'1"/185 cm and wears a size medium.
